Product name: Monogram Duffel Bag Personalized Navy Gym Bag Duffle
Description:
This monogrammed duffel bag measures 18" x 10" x 10" and it's made with recycled materials!    It also has an outside zippered pockets and easy to carry 7" handles and an adjustable/removable shoulder strap. Makes a great overnight or weekend bag! This bag is available in several colors: navy, red, purple, hot pink, royal, orange, white, light blue, kelly green, yelllow, olive, khaki, lime, and black. Monogramming is included in the price!
.
When you order, please stay in touch with me- I may have a question for you! Often, I will message on Etsy and email, but my emails end up in your spam folder.
Your monogram is included in the price. If you don't see the color of thread that you'd like, just message me-I have tons of thread! The thread and font choices are located underneath the photo of the navy duffle bag.
For multiple bags for bridesmaid gifts, click here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/DoubleBMonograms?ref=hdr_shop_menu§ion_id=12990546
For other monogram duffel bags, click here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/DoubleBMonograms?ref=hdr_shop_menu§ion_id=14055095
If you have questions, please feel free to message me! I can help with fonts and colors. Please give me the initials or name that you would like in the note to seller at checkout. If you would like a traditional woman's monogram, the last name initial goes in the center and it's larger, so make sure to verify which letter is the last name initial. Men's monograms are traditionally done in the order of their names and all the same size letters. There are certainly exceptions!
Monogram bags are shipped USPS insured within 4-6 business days. Expedited service may be available on certain items.
Double B Monograms is a family owned, home based business. We strive to carry high quality items and monogrammed gifts that folks truly love to receive! Our monogrammed bags and totes make great teachers gifts, bridesmaid gifts, gifts for girlfriends, or a gift for you! If you have any questions about our monogrammed gym  bags, please message me and I'll be happy to help! Thanks for shopping with us!

Product name: Shark Pencil Pouch
Description:
Open wide! 
What will your shark devour today?
These fun pouches were designed to hold pencils but you can use them for so much more! While generously sized to hold pencils these can be alternatively used to hold makeup, coins, money, or even small toys!
Each shark is 10" long and has a white zippered mouth that when open acts as teeth. The lining for each shark is made with either a red or pink printed fabric. Eyes are safety eyes and are highly shatter resistant, but to be safe these are not intended for children under age 4.
****New in 2016!!!*****
All shark pouches made in 2016 use my new "larger teeth" zippers so each shark is able to take an even larger bite ::chomp chomp::
Please see photos 3-5 for fabric 
Other fabrics ARE available.  Please inquire as to current stock or to request a certain color.
All custom sharks ship in 1 week

Product name: Pfaltzgraff Royale American Bone China Square Vase, Made in USA
Description:
This beautiful Pfaltzgraff Royal American Bone China Square Vase has a delicate medallion-type raised design that incorporates vines and simple flowers in a series of heart shapes on cream bone china.  The design is repeated on all four sides with gold trim around the top edge which flares out slightly.  The main body of the vase is about a 3.25 inch square and is approximately 6 inches tall.  
The bottom has a clear hallmark.
The vase is in perfect condition with 100% of the gold and is very lovely.

Product name: Birthday Gift - Beach Chair - Monogrammed Kids Folding Chair - Childrens Camping Chair - Kids Sports Chair - Personalized Outdoor Chair
Description:
Please read the entire description before ordering.
Kids will love to have their own chair for all their outdoor activities personalized with their name, initial, or monogram. 
Looking for a LARGER size? Check out my other listing:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/482636538/christmas-gift-birthday-gift-monogrammed
Please leave the name, monogram, or initial you wish stitched in the notes to seller section upon checkout. 
Monograms are traditionally stitched out as First LAST Middle name, so Amy Lynn Page would be APL. 
Please ensure that you indicate which letter is which. 
Also indicate what color thread you would like. 
Virtually all colors are available. 
Please be specific. For example, tell me turquoise, baby blue, royal blue, or navy blue instead of just "blue."
Please indicate what font choice you would like, Block, Script, or Curlz.
Additional font Choices are here: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.480898412116039.1073741852.296465130559369&type=3
If you are unsure or have any questions, please message me. I do not mind sending a proof prior to stitching. Monograms can not be removed once stitched. All sales are final.
All embroidered items are stitched on quality blanks. Stitches and chair logo show on the back side of the chair. The logo is large and goes across the back of the chair. If you would like to see pictures, please message me. 
-Steel frame construction provides strength and durability
-Safety Lock system for comfort and prevents pinching
-Built-in mesh cup holder keeps drinks close at hand
-Folding design allows easy storage and transport
-Includes a matching polyester carry bag with shoulder strap
-Weight limit of 125 lbs.
-Chair measures approximately 27"x16"x16" and weighs just over 3 lbs
-Chair seat is approximately 12" from the ground
*Please note - the manufacturer sometimes changes the style/trim/color of the chairs. If there are any unforeseen issues with your choices I will message you. 
Have a special request? Other characters are available. Custom orders are gladly accepted, just send me a message and I will gladly help you out.
Please visit my fan page, www.facebook.com/MonkaDunkCreations

Product name: Braided Crib Bumper - Knot Pillow, Knot Cushion, Decorative Pillow, Bolster, Crib Bedding, Crib Sheets, Baby Bedding, Baby Shower Gift
Description:
Get a quality product, a shapely and very soft, beautifully braided crib bumper that is made from premium 100% hypoallergenic materials.
The crib bumper protects your baby's hands and feet from getting stuck between crib spindles as well as it protects the baby's head and body from hitting and bruising against the crib walls. The bumper allows for air flow and with 10 colours to choose from, it maches your nursery decor!
* * * SIZE * * *
The braided crib bumpers come in five (5) different sizes to accommodate your crib coverage needs:
- 1 SHORT SIDE - 27" x 5.5"
- 1 LONG SIDE - 53" x 5.5" 
- HALF CRIB - 80" x 5.5" (1 Short and 1 Long Side)
- 3 SIDES - 110" x 5.5" (2 short, 1 long Side)
- FULL CRIB  - 160" x 5.5"
The short or long braided crib bumpers can also be used as tummy time support or decorative pillows. 
* * * CUSTOM SIZE * * *
Please contact us if you want your braided crib bumper to be of specific length. We can create any length of bumper you require.
* * * MIXED COLOURS * * *
We can mix 2 or 3 colours, just choose option  'MIXED' under colour and include your options in the comments/notes section at checkout.
* * * ATTACHING YOUR CRIB BUMPER * * *
The braided crib bumper comes with matching fabric ties, allowing for flexible attachment in the desired spots.
* * * SHIPPING * * *
Fast 3-5 day delivery time within US and Canada.
For INTERNATIONAL OVERSEAS SHIPPING 
Europe: 7-14 business days by AIR shipping
Australia: 3-6 weeks by SURFACE shipping
* * * MATERIALS & CARE INSTRUCTIONS * * *
All braids are made with high quality infant safe cotton blend fabric and 100% PREMIUM HYPOALLERGENIC polyester filling. There are 10 beautiful colours for you to chose from!
All braided bumpers can be easily spot cleaned or machine washed in low temperature on gentle cycle.

Product name: Wool Felt Sheets // Choose your own colors // Felt Square, Wool Fabric, Nonwoven Fabric, Merino Wool, Waldorf Felt, Custom Felt Colors
Description:
Wool blend felt in all the colors of the rainbow! Select any 20 9x12" sheets or 10 12x18" sheets from our drop down menu. View our online swatch chart (shown in the second image above) to make a a custom selection of colors. Note these colors in the "message to seller" box at checkout, if no colors are selected, our favorite color palettes will be packaged. Two 9x12" sheets is equivalent to one 12x18" sheet, please make note if you would prefer two 9x12" sheets to be a single 12x18" sheet, we would love to accommodate! Can't decide on a color? Coordinating skeins of DMC embroidery floss are also available. View our entire 90 color collections here: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/BenzieDesign?section_id=12418940&ref=shopsection_leftnav_2
{ About Benzie's felt }
Wool felt is one of the most versatile and beautiful fabrics to create with, a blend of 20-35% merino wool with the remainder viscose make it resistant to pilling and pulling, easy to cut, affordable -all working together to provide maximum craft-ability. Benzie's felt is approximately 1mm thick. Our carefully curated rainbow includes a wide variety of brilliant and pure colors and is available in cut sheets and yardage. We are honored to be the largest supplier of wool blend felt on Etsy for over five years.
{ About Benzie on Etsy }
A swatch chart is included in the second image of all custom listings, to enlarge click on the magnifying glass found on the lower right hand corner. Color accuracy may vary from screen to screen and we suggest purchasing samples or a swatch chart for complete color accuracy ---- 
www.etsy.com/listing/62153095/felt-swatch-chart.
 Coordinating DMC floss is available for all of Benzie's items. Note that our wool felt colors are different from our felt pom colors. For shipping information and general questions visits our policies page: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/BenzieDesign/policy
{ Home Page }
http://www.benziedesign.etsy.com
 or http://www.benziedesign.com

Description:
Recently engaged?...Or have a friend who is?  This such a cute way of letting people know they will soon be going from a Miss a Mrs! 
Giving as a gift?  Fill it will honeymoon essentials like sunblock, lip gloss and a cute beach towel!  
Buying for yourself?  Fill it with all your wedding planning goodies like your notebooks, brochures, bridal mags, etc. Then after, fill it with all your honeymoon travel essentials! Its a great memento that you can enjoy using all year long.
This canvas tote bag is the perfect carry-all to fill with all your beach essentials and day-to-day goodies like groceries, yoga gear, and farmers market finds.  
This bag is machine washable and made of a superior quality cotton canvas that will go the distance.  Perfect for hitting the sand!
**Can be personalized with any date or year. Place your inscription requests in the "Note to Seller" at time of purchase**
This original design by Shine Bridal is also available on T's, tanks, cute ceramic mugs and cozy pillows, which can also be found in our shop.

~We understand the importance of finding "the one" :) so we offer a flexible return policy for bridal test items (see Shop Policies for info)
~Need it in SILVER instead of GOLD? Need an item in a different COLOR? No problem! Just drop us a note.
~All colors and styles can be mixed and matched. Let us help you find your perfect match!
------------------------------------------------
::ITS IN THE QUALITY::
~Know what you’re buying: We use superior quality metals like sterling silver, 14 karat gold filled and vermeil - unlike many other Etsy shops that use strictly "gold plated" and "silver plated" metals
~Our ear hooks and chains are all sterling or 14 karat gold filled (unless otherwise noted) which are nickel-free and HYPOALLERGENIC
*Some Details*
~GIFT BOX: All jewelry arrives carefully packaged in a gift box with satin ribbon
~LENGTH: All necklace/bracelet lengths can be adjusted by request
~CLIP-ON: Almost all earrings can be made into clip-ons
~We never include pricing info in our packages - so they are ready gift giving
~All earrings come with rubber ear-backs to keep them securely in place while you dance the night away!
~All items are carefully made-to-order just for you!
------------------------------------------------
::PRESS & PRAISE::
Shine Bridal has been seen in:
~Southern Weddings Magazine, Jewelry Affaire Magazine, The Celebration Society Magazine, Hitched on Maui, The Knot, Style Me Pretty, DIY Bride, BRITCO, College Fashionista, and many more!....
~Thank you for your continued support. We look forward to working with you! 
xo Shine Bridal

Description:
Cheer on your favorite team while wearing something that no-one else has! Every day is a "Sliding Into Home Kinda Day".  This is the perfect tee to wear to any baseball, softball, t ball game! (The color of the shirt in the main photo is "white fleck". )
Crew neck (Unisex): Our most favorite & versatile tee that can be worn both by men and women. Full neckline & full body length. Super soft, lightweight and easy to dress up or down with shorts or jeans.  Runs true to size for a looser “boyfriend” fit and is 100% cotton. 
▲▲▲SHIRT INFORMATION▲▲▲
- See size chart for sizing (view all pictures)
- Shirts are meant to be loose. (unisex shirts) If you want it form fitting, order a size smaller
- Additionally, if you are in between sizes order the smaller of the size.
- Shirts may vary slightly due to monitor displays or vendors.
- Sleeves can be rolled or left undone. 
▲▲▲POLICIES/ EXCHANGES/REFUNDS▲▲▲
- Please read the policies before placing an order. (NO refunds. I will happily exchange sizes only) I cannot guarantee shipping times.  The Gameday Chic is not responsible for incorrectly provided addresses that result in lost or misdirected packages. If packages are returned to us for an incorrect address and need to be reshipped there is a 5 reshippment fee along with the cost of the shipment. Your order will not be refunded if you decide you no longer want the package. Please make sure to enter in the correct shipping address at checkout.  
▲▲▲ SHIPPING INFORMATION▲▲▲
- Due to the fact they are each printed on demand, please allow 3-5 days for processing time (excluding holidays/weekends). 
- Once they are shipped you can expect for it to arrive within 3-5 business days. I send an email when it has shipped with a USPS tracking number!
- HOLIDAY TIME!! : I get your order out as fast as I possibly can. Being that I order most of my gifts online, I completely understand what it is like to order something & have to wait for it to arrive. Likewise,USPS slows down quite a bit from having so many packages to send. Please keep this in mind for when you decide to place an order as a gift to someone during that time.
▲▲▲ CARE ▲▲▲
-Machine wash cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors. Use non-chlorine bleach, only when necessary. No fabric softeners.
-Tumble dry low, or hang-dry for longest life. 100% cotton items WILL shrink in length in the dryer so beware of that. 
-Cool iron inside-out if necessary. Do not iron decoration.
-Do not dry clean.
** I accept custom orders- so please send me a message if you don't see what you like and I will do my best to help accommodate you. **

Product name: Work Sock Grey and Cream with Red Stripe BABY Toddler Child Crochet SHEEPSKIN Booties with Grey Leather Suede and Sheepskin Shearling Sole
Description:
Affordable and adorable!! Crochet sheepskin booties and slippers made from quality materials to keep your child's feet warm and cozy! Each pair of booties and slippers are made with love and great care in a clean, smoke free and pet free home.
The sole consists of leather suede on the outside bottom for wear and tear while the inside bottom is soft sheepskin shearling for warmth and comfort. The best of both worlds for your little one's cute toes!! The crocheted upper is made with 80% acrylic for softness and 20% wool for warmth - a perfect combination for the ultimate pair of booties or slippers!! If grey leather suede is unavailable, it will be substituted for another complimentary colour!!
** MADE TO ORDER **
Sizing:
Sole length 3 1/2" - will fit approximately a newborn
Sole length 4" - will fit approximately 0 - 3 months
Sole length 4.5" - will fit approximately 3 - 6 months
Sole length 5" - will fit approximately 6 - 12 months
Sole length 5 1/2" - will fit approximately 1 - 2 years
Sole length 6" - will fit approximately 2 years
Sole length 6 1/2" - will fit approximately 2 - 3 years
Sole length 7" - will fit approximately 4 years
Sole length 7.5" - will fit approximately 5 years
Sole length 8" - will fit approximately 6 years
* Please measure the length of your little one's feet before ordering a size - add at least 1/2" (for walkers) to 1" (for non-walkers) for proper sizing. Order up a size if you feel your baby or child is in between sizes. Each bootie or slipper comes with an ankle tie, which helps to secure the shoe on babe's foot!! When in doubt about a size, please feel free to contact me!! I am here to help!!
ALL LISTINGS IN OUR SHEEPSKIN BOOTIES SECTION CAN BE CHANGED TO A LEATHER SOLE FOR 4. If you would like a custom pair of booties created for you, please send me a message indicating the size and colour(s) you would like your pair of booties or slippers made with. We will work together to make sure your booties or slippers are made to your exact specifications.
ANY PAIR OF BOOTIES/SLIPPERS (leather suede or leather) CAN BE PAIRED WITH A MATCHING HAT!! Just send me a note and we can work out the details!! 
If you would like a custom matching set of booties/slippers and hat created for you, please send me a message indicating the size and colour(s) you would love!! We will work together to make sure your matching set of booties/slippers and hat are made to your exact specifications.

All of our shirts are hand printed by us (we are a wife and husband team) They are either screen printed using water based environmentally friendly inks, or imprinted using a dye sublimation process where the ink is heated up to bond with the fabric and will not wash out. We always recommend to wash on a cool cycle inside out and either hang dry or cool tumble for the longest life of your shirt.
Shipping:
Our shipping for the US is a flat rate 3 for 1 item or 100 items! All other countries it is 12 for the first item and 1 for each additional item.
Processing times:
All our items are made to order so they can take up to 2 weeks to ship. We do our best to get them out asap, and sometimes we can get them out in less than a week. However, if you need them sooner please contact us prior to ordering and we will do what we can to work with you on rushing them out.
Thanks so much for taking the time to check our shop out!

💜Care Instructions:💜
🔴Machine wash gently with shirt inside out on cold. 
🔴Dry on low with shirt inside out or hang dry.
🔴Do not iron on image.

🔴For best results, hang between use.
